node.html: This is my implementation of the Deep Resdual Learning for Image Recognition(Commonly known as Resnet) paper using Pytorch.The Architecture is further tested on CIFA10 dataset.
This repo contains my implementation of Convolutional Networks for Biomedical Image Segmentation Paper(U-Net) using pytorch.
A collection of my labs on Geometric Deep Learning based on the protobook in the above link.
My notebooks on foundations of machine learning using python and pytorch.Some of the Algorithms are implemented from scratch
Deployed a machine Learning model on heroku that predicts whether an individual qualifies for a loan or not based on some variables
machine learning model to assess if a twitter post that is related to vaccinations is positive, neutral, or negative.

Forecast model to predict the number of incoming calls that Childline Kenya will receive per hour per day to help them manage their resources and staff their call center more efficiently hence enabling them to better serve as many children as possible.
Mimicing the working of an Automated Teller Machine(ATM).Implemented 4 main functionalities(Validating pin,deposit,withdraw,check balance,get mini statement) using C language
Machine Learning model to predict forest fires in Democratic Republic of Congo
